name: Out West
description:
WARNING: Graphic text descriptions of violence and gore.

Out West

The year is 1873. You are a lone traveler somewhere in the American West. You arrive in a new town not unlike the last, but something feels off. Can you help rid of Brokenwater from its evil? 

My first attempt at Bitsy and my first attempt at game design in general. This game serves as a love letter to Westerns and 90s Adventure games. It also gave me something to do during this summer. 

Design, Art, Music - Grant Gelardi

Playtesting, Bug Fixing, Inspiration and Special Thanks - Camden Pettijohn
